Hello Allan,

Yabu is a Japanese Bush as in Plant. In the Book Shogun by James Clavell, who was a prisoner of War in a Japanese WW II Prisoner Camp, where he learned a lot about the Japanese and saw many autrocities, later as a Novelist he wrote Shogun and made the  Lord Yabu a Shogun throughout the book,  but he is actually a ficticious figure and feudal lord.

Shaku-Oh-Cho
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Allan 
  To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 12, 2003 5:17 PM
  Subject: [samuraihistory] just joined


  Hello. I'm looking for a historical japanese figure by the name 
  of "Yabu". He was either a samurai or shogun. Can anyone help?
